title: Intensive Financial Accounting Basics Training Using Visual Demonstrations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic accounting terminology comprehension and fundamental Excel skills
context.additional_context: Blended sessions combining digital device (tablet/laptop) practicals with in-person lectures (3 theory + 2 practical sessions)

learning_goals: Learners understand the basic structure of financial statements and classify account items with 80% accuracy
Referencing observed hand movements from demonstration lectures, learners correct errors with 90% accuracy when recording journal entries
Applying learned accounting principles, learners analyze real-world business cases and create three types of financial statements using digital tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
